images.prompt: A handsome young Indian man in traditional festive attire, wearing a pink floral patterned shirt, light grey slim fit pant and a Blue strap smartwatch. He is sitting gracefully, holding a decorated brass thali filled with lit diyas (oil lamps)in both hands.Her head is slightly tilted, with a gentle smile and expressive eyeslooking towards the camera. The background features warmglowing fairy lights, candles, and a blurred god laxmi idol, creating a devotional festive vibe. Foreground bokeh of alowing diyas adds depth. Cinematic photography, soft warm lighting, high detail, professional portrait style. For making this photo use the above photo and don't change her face it should be exact same 100%

A handsome young Indian man wearing a golden kurta with white churidar pants, smiling joyfully as he holds a lit sparkler in his hand. His face glows with the warm light of the sparkler, and the background shimmers with fairy lights, candles, and marigold garlands. Foreground bokeh of diyas adds cinematic depth. Professional festive portrait, soft golden lighting, high detail, cinematic photography.

A young Indian man dressed in a white kurta with a saffron dupatta, holding a lit sparkler close to a rangoli decorated with diyas and flowers. He is smiling softly, with a background of goddess Laxmi idol, glowing fairy lights, and marigold garlands. Foreground diya bokeh creates cinematic depth, professional festive portrait, high detail, soft golden light, devotional and joyful vibe.

A young Indian man in a cream sherwani standing beside his father dressed in a traditional dhoti-kurta. Both are smiling as they light diyas together on a decorated rangoli. The background glows with fairy lights, flower garlands, and a blurred goddess Laxmi idol. Foreground bokeh of diyas adds cinematic depth. Captured with a 50mm f/1.8 lens, shallow depth of field, soft golden lighting, professional festive portrait.

A young Indian woman in a red silk saree with golden zari border, holding a lit sparkler in her hand with a joyful smile. Her jewelry glows in the warm sparkler light, hair adorned with jasmine flowers. Background features fairy lights, marigold garlands, and diyas. Foreground diya bokeh creates cinematic depth. Captured with a 50mm f/1.8 lens, shallow depth of field, soft golden lighting, professional festive portrait.

A graceful Indian girl in a yellow anarkali suit with mirror work, sitting cross-legged on the floor while decorating a colorful rangoli with flower petals and diyas. Background shows glowing lanterns, marigold garlands, and candles. Captured with a 35mm lens, warm golden tones, cinematic festive portrait photography.

A young woman in a pastel pink lehenga with embroidered dupatta, holding a brass diya in both hands during evening aarti. She stands in front of a beautifully decorated goddess Laxmi idol with fairy lights and flower garlands. Foreground diya bokeh adds cinematic depth. Captured with a 35mm f/1.4 lens, low-light golden glow, devotional cinematic portrait.

Two sisters dressed in contrasting festive outfits, one in a green lehenga and the other in a red saree, laughing joyfully as they light sparklers together. Background filled with marigold garlands, fairy lights, and hanging lanterns. Captured with a 24mm wide-angle lens, motion blur sparkler trails, cinematic family festive portrait.

A beautiful Indian woman in a royal blue saree with sequins, standing on a decorated balcony railing with flower garlands and diyas. She looks up at colorful fireworks bursting in the sky, holding a diya in her hand. Captured with a 35mm lens, long exposure night photography, cinematic festive portrait.

A young Indian girl in a pastel orange lehenga smiling with her mother in a traditional red saree. Both are placing diyas on a rangoli together. Background features glowing fairy lights and flower petals. Captured with a 50mm f/1.8 lens, warm soft golden lighting, cinematic family festive portrait.
